Package edu.salle.url.api.exception

Class UnreachableServerException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.io.IOException
edu.salle.url.api.exception.ApiException
edu.salle.url.api.exception.UnreachableServerException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class UnreachableServerException extends ApiException
Signals that an error has occurred when trying to connect to a server. Specifically, this exception is thrown when the server is unreachable due to external circumstances.

  • Constructor Details

    • UnreachableServerException

      public UnreachableServerException(String url, IOException cause)
      Constructs a UnreachableServerException indicating that a certain server is unreachable.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL that the program was trying to access. This is used to build a predefined detail message.
      cause - The original exception signalling the unreachable server, which should be an IOException.
